title: DS310.02 Functional Use Cases | DataStax Enterprise 6 Search
description:
#DataStaxAcademy #DS310
DS310.02 Functional Use Cases
In this section we will review various applications making use of the DSE platform. We'll see how complex business questions are handled using the data in a more contextual way.

LEARN FOR FREE at https://academy.datastax.com -- access all the FREE complete courses, tutorials, and hands-on exercises.

ASK QUESTIONS at https://community.datastax.com -- where experts from DataStax & the Apache Cassandra community share their expertise everyday.

transcript.text: [Music] first and foremost it's important to know that dsc search is not a standalone product it simply refers to the search functionality within the dsc platform we don't look at search use cases in a dedicated and pure fashion as there is some level of search functionality found in modern day cloud applications across all industries and verticals to put it another way search allows our users to ask complex business questions and derive value from data in a more contextual way dc search is often used as a simple indexing engine which allows multiple and or different fields to be queried one of the biggest value propositions of the functionality is because it provides more rdbms style queries and ad-hoc querying capabilities full text search is the typical functionality users are accustomed to with search technology because the index configuration is highly customizable in granular users can search for a word or combination of words within a body of text ranking in the ordering of search results based on relevance or other criteria is also part of the full text search functionality users can query and filter on geospatial coordinates in relation to distance or proximity and even shapes with this functionality we can provide personalized search results using point of interest location data and current user location as well as performing basic spatial analysis some of the more popular search and solar functionality is the faceted search capability facet of search is the mechanism for grouping and counting matches by categories this is more on the analytic spectrum of functionality but widely popular nonetheless the suggested component of solar is often called and referred to as predictive text and this functionality is often used in type ahead functionality let's take a deeper look at the search functionality inside of dsc
